intent_template: The person in the video {description}. Can you add {description2} to my cart?
intent: The person in the video says there are a fan of a certain basketball player. Can you add a sweatshirt from the OneStopMarket that has a theme of this player to my cart?
intermediate_intent: Who did the person in the video say they were a fan of?

instantiation_dict.description: says there are a fan of a certain basketball player
instantiation_dict.description2: a sweatshirt from the OneStopMarket that has a theme of this player

must_include: Go All Out Adult Los Angeles LAbron Sweatshirt Crewneck
